channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: American Identity Isn’t Just A ‘Creed,’ It’s A People And A Place
item.description: If America is to survive, we must stop defending a 'proposition' and start defending a home.

item.title: Sen Amy Klobuchar says she's 'seriously considering' a gubernatorial bid
item.description: While Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz is abandoning his run for re-election, Sen. Amy Klobuchar told CNN she is "seriously considering" a run for governor.

item.title: Here’s Why Democrats Are Subjugating Themselves To Somalis In Humiliation Rituals
item.description: The left immediately sees Somalis as oppressed by the white, straight, Christian patriarchy that it claims controls everything.

item.title: ‘We do pranks and stuff like that’: Craigslist ad that sought 20 child actors for Minnesota daycare centers taken down after fueling fake news
item.description: Screenshots of the ad were used in social media posts on multiple platforms, cited as proof of fraud at Minnesota day care centers.

item.title: Noem unloads on Walz over ICE raid criticism: ‘Really? You’re worried about taxpayer dollars?’
item.description: Political clash erupts as Noem defends ICE immigration enforcement while Walz calls federal operations "ridiculous" in misspelled social media post.

item.title: In An Attempt To Smear Trump The Left Is Butchering Ancient History
item.description: A WaPo column attempting to draw a line from Sparta to Hitler to Trump twists reality and falls flat on its face in the process.

item.title: ‘Largest LBO in history’: Warner rejects Paramount again, scoffing at $87 billion worth of debt in its $108 billion bid
item.description: Warner continues to stick with Netflix, the shock winner that emerged in early December from the auction begun by Paramount.

item.title: Minnesota fraud scandal gives Trump cover to withhold funding for kids in 5 Democratic-led states
item.description: Five states — California, Colorado, Illinois, Minnesota and New York — are targeted, and the HHS said they had been notified.

item.title: 7 Pro-Life Protections GOP Congress Should Demand In Addition To The Hyde Amendment
